channel.title: ML on Ballistic AI
channel.description: Recent content in ML on Ballistic AI

item.title: What we do
item.description: Ballistic AI is a boutique consulting firm specializing in AI/ML consulting for businesses wishing to integrate AI/ML offerings into their services and worlflows. We have over two decades of experience in the Linux and Open Source communities and over a decade of development in several Linux Distros. Open Source is at the heart of what we do, and we look forward to being able to help your business grow by leveraging Open Source Technology.
